translation.en: I used to be so small... and so scared.
translation.fr:
J'étais toute fragile
et constamment terrifiée.

translation.en: Now I'm strong... and I'm confident...
translation.fr: Je suis devenue forte... et sûre de moi.

translation.en: and that's all I ever wanted.
translation.fr: C'est tout ce que je voulais.

translation.en: And, so, that's all I was to you.
translation.fr: C'est tout ce que j'étais pour toi ?

translation.en: You just used me to get what you wanted.
translation.fr: Le moyen d'avoir ce que tu voulais ?

translation.en: No, Cole. I chose you.
I mean, I could've shot you and not Allison,
translation.fr: J'aurais pu te tuer et épargner Allison.

translation.en: but I didn't. I chose you.
'Cause you're the best.
We click, right? You're my guy.
translation.fr: On se comprend, toi et moi.

translation.en: I'm not the first kid, am I?
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas le premier, hein ?

translation.en: And you'll leave here and just find another faucet.
translation.fr:
Tu vas repartir
et trouver un autre robinet.

translation.en: -You heard that? -I heard everything. This is my house.
translation.fr:
- Tu m'as entendue ?
- J'entends tout. C'est chez moi.

translation.en: Okay, yes.
And tonight sucked, but we can start again.
translation.fr:
Et ce soir, c'était nul,
mais on peut recommencer à zéro.

translation.en: So, you have a plan?
Yeah. We just say they attacked us.
translation.fr: On n'a qu'à dire qu'ils nous ont attaqués.

translation.en: I got him.
Plus, dude, we would have so much fun.
Just you and me against the whole world.
translation.fr: Toi et moi contre le monde entier.

translation.en: No one will ever hurt you ever again.
There'll be nothing left to be afraid of. Isn't that what you wanted?
translation.fr:
Il n'y a plus rien pour t'effrayer.
C'est pas ce que tu voulais ?

translation.en: What do you say, Cole?
I guess...
I guess I have a plan, too.
[boy] Pussy!
-When you're ready, you're ready. -A lot of things are scary.
translation.fr:
- Si tu ne te sens pas prêt, pas de souci.
- La vie est effrayante.

translation.en: You gotta figure out what you want...
translation.fr: Réfléchis bien à ce que tu veux...

translation.en: -and then do what you can to get it. -Keys...
translation.fr:
- et bats-toi pour l'avoir.
- Les clés...

translation.en: Ten. Two.
translation.fr: Les mains à dix heures dix.

translation.en: What up, Cee?
You drove a car into your house.
translation.fr: Tu as foncé dans ta maison.

translation.en: I really didn't see that coming.
You never told me...
your intergalactic dream team.
translation.fr:
qui serait
dans ton équipe intergalactique.

translation.en: You didn't ask.
translation.fr: Tu ne me l'as pas demandé.

translation.en: I should have.
I'm usually pretty good at that stuff.
Admiral Adama to lead.
Data for his intelligence and cool head.
translation.fr:
Data pour son intelligence
et son sang-froid.

translation.en: Predator to fight.
Then me and you.
You didn't say we could add ourselves.
translation.fr:
Tu ne m'avais pas dit
qu'on pouvait en faire partie.

translation.en: It's science fiction. You can do anything.
translation.fr:
C'est de la science-fiction.
On peut tout faire.

translation.en: Well... I guess that's true.
But don't you get it yet?
I am the big bad.
I loved you.
I don't care about your dumb book or your stupid cult.
translation.fr:
Je me fiche de ton grimoire
et de ton culte ridicule.

translation.en: I'm an adult...
because when I realized you were the big bad...
translation.fr:
parce que, quand j'ai compris
que tu étais mon ennemie...

translation.en: and you betrayed me
and were just gonna hurt other kids,
translation.fr: et que tu exploiterais d'autres enfants...

translation.en: I drove a stolen car through you.
translation.fr: je t'ai écrasée avec une voiture volée.

translation.en: That, I'll give you. [chuckles]
I'll see you, Cee.
Goodbye.
-[Melanie's dad] Martinez. -Yeah?
Protect and serve, idiot.
-[Melanie] It's just a car. -Protect my car.
Just a car?! Just a car?!
Do not-- Put your hand down right now.
-I thought you were gonna drive away. -I couldn't leave you.
translation.fr: J'ai cru que tu allais t'enfuir. Pas sans toi.

translation.en: That was such a douche car.
Melanie, get over here.
Get back here. Now.
Bye.
[Melanie's dad] Oh, my God.
Did you just put your face on him? Wanna go get tattoos now?
translation.fr:
Tu viens de l'embrasser ?
Vous allez vous faire tatouer ?

translation.en: Yo. What happened?
Dude, Cole stole a car.
Rammed his house. Killed, like, 50 people.
translation.fr:
Il a défoncé sa maison.
Il a tué 50 personnes.

translation.en: Fifty people. [scoffs]
[Jeremy] Hey, let's get out of here.
Today, y'all. Let's go.
The hell?
Cindy.
-[Mom] Do you have my son? Please... -[Dad] Cole.
[Mom] Honey. Honey. Oh, my God.
Are you okay? Are you...?
-I'm okay. -[Dad] Are you all right?
-Oh, my God. What happened? -Is that blood?
Hey. What happened?
I don't need a babysitter anymore.
translation.fr: Je n'ai plus besoin de baby-sitter.

translation.en: ♪ Should've the known from the jump Yeah ♪
